metadata.title: CVE-2015-6584 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the DataTables plugin 1.10.8and earlier for jQuery allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via the scripts parameter tomedia/unit_testing/templates/6776.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-jquery-datatables - 1.10.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: datatables.js package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.9+dfsg-1').
